Package com.concordia.soen6441riskgame

Class RGGameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGameFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class RGGameFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class creates a frame with two panels. On the left panel, players can see the map and its current status. On the right panel, players can interact with the application. Players can play all the phases on this frame.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julian Beltran, Nesar, Amit
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RGGameFrame

        RGGameFrame​(RGFile file,
            RGGame game,
            RGPlayer player)
        This constructor set the frame and the panels. On the left panel the constructor add the drawing of the map that is created in the class RGMapGraph.
        Parameters:
        file - File where the Risk® map is stored.
        game - Current game.
        player - Current set of players.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpPhase

        void setUpPhase()
        This method is used to create the Setup Phase. This method draws all the components of this phase on the right panel of the frame.

      • reinforcementPhase

        void reinforcementPhase()
        This method is used to create the Reinforcement Phase. This method draws all the components of this phase on the right panel of the frame.

      • fortificationPhase

        void fortificationPhase()
        This method is used to create the Fortification Phase. This method draws all the components of this phase on the right panel of the frame.
